newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.870 (30.895).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.870 (30.895).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown on Tuesday at 30.870 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 30.895 and at 20.539 to the mark from 20.528.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT) and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.49 percent, the same as on Monday.
